abilities.name: Sticky Goo
abilities.effect: As long as Dark Muk is your Active Pokémon, your opponent pays 2 more to retreat his or her Active Pokémon. This power stops working while Dark Muk is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Sludge Punch
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
